title: Arlington House, The Robert  E. Lee Memorial: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         NPS Image  The Arlington House Junior Ranger Program This program is designed for children. Participants can become certified Junior Rangers by visiting the park and completing the activities in the Junior Ranger workbook. Those who successfully complete the program will receive an official Arlington House Junior Ranger badge and a certificate signed by an Arlington House park ranger! Download the Jr. Ranger Book
